name: TWICE. GameOff 2022
description:
TWICE

A game in which you have to play as two characters at once, a kind of local multiplayer. There is an accident in the science complex, and the man has lost control over it. Thomas and Alice have to get out of the scientific complex with the help of their combined efforts, but will they succeed? Play the game and find out the answer to that question! 

Each of the characters has its advantages and disadvantages, their combination will make you wiggle your brain, solving puzzles in the levels! But be careful, your way will not be without obstacles. You will have to either carefully avoid the monsters or fight them!


Unique mechanics

Pick up and throw objects where you needSwitching between two characters Play as two characters with different abilities!

Fighting with enemies

Shoot the enemies!

Solve the puzzles



Also take a look at the game teaser on our YouTube channel: Controls:
  • WASD - walk,
  • Space - Jump,
  • LMB - Gun Shoot,
  • RMB - throw gun or objects,
  • F - move the heavy box,
  • Left Shift (for alice) - squat,
  • E or Q to switch between players.
